item.title: [Python] Run Blue Prism process using Python (SOAP)
item.description: Introduction With Blue Prism, a process (robot) can be exposed as a WebService and can be executed externally. In this article, I’ll write a client in Python and call a Blue Prism process. There are two prerequisites for running the process exposed as a WebService. Another article and set the preconditions. A. Blue Prism server service is running B. public There is a runtime resource started by the switch.
